txt.en: '[placeholder], thank you for aiding our efforts here at Sûru. Please return to Girhâzi and tell her of our progress. Our work goes quite well, owing in no small part to the support you have given us [placeholder].'
Ningêna has asked you to return to Girhâzi and update her on the situation at Sûru.
You have completed many tasks to support the Dumûri at Sûru.

'How goes Sûru, [placeholder]?'

You tell her that the Dumûri are holding steady at the crossing and that construction on the fortress continues without issue.

'That is good news! I am grateful for your contributions there. Once we have gathered enough strength, we will push the Ordâkhai out of Eshadûr and Ambarûl will be free. Unfortunately, even that will not be enough. The more difficult task will be ensuring Ambarûl remains free, as there always seems to be a new threat on the horizon.'
'Thank you for aiding our efforts here at Sûru, [placeholder]. Please return to Girhâzi and tell her of our progress.'
